title: Exchanges & On-Ramps
intro: Frankencoin (ZCHF) is available on a range of platforms—from regulated Swiss on-ramps to decentralized exchanges. Whether you prefer a bank transfer or a direct swap, there is a convenient way to obtain ZCHF.

exchanges.name: Mt Pelerin
exchanges.description: Swiss-regulated on-ramp: buy ZCHF directly with a bank transfer via your personal IBAN. Fully compliant and beginner-friendly.

exchanges.name: DFX
exchanges.description: Swiss-based service for buying and selling ZCHF with bank transfers. Simple, compliant, and non-custodial—your keys, your coins.

exchanges.name: Curve
exchanges.description: Leading decentralized exchange optimized for stablecoins. Swap ZCHF with low slippage and deep liquidity on Ethereum.

exchanges.name: Uniswap
exchanges.description: The most widely used decentralized exchange. Trade ZCHF permissionlessly on Ethereum and other networks with full transparency.

exchanges.name: MEXC
exchanges.description: Global centralized exchange with ZCHF trading pairs. Register an account, deposit funds, and trade ZCHF with competitive fees.

exchanges.name: CowSwap
exchanges.description: MEV-protected decentralized exchange. Batch auctions find you the best available price for your ZCHF trades automatically.
